metadata.name: Vasuvian Dragon
metadata.description:
We are all Vasuvians, one and the same, one of many, many of one, one of many, many as one. 

Following the attack on planet Vasuvia by the Ruzakans, while undergoing its own process of transcendence & rebirth, remnants of this planet's energy as a beacon of hope, love, peace, and harmony further spread across & beyond the multiverse becoming infused with the hearts & souls of every being everywhere, including intergalactic & multidimensional travelers such as dragons. 

One such intergalactic, multidimensional being was a Zoe's Dragon traveling & overcoming infinite bridges of time, space & beyond while transforming into a beacon of hope, an invincible being spreading its wings of love, peace, & harmony while flying across & beyond the multiverse.
